metadata.dc:author: Caracuel Redondo, F
Mendez López, J M
Grau Galtés, P
Gómez Fernández, J M
metadata.dc:description: Most carpal dislocations occur in the lunate bone or around it (perilunate). An isolated dislocation of the carpal scaphoid is a rare injury. We report a case of a palmar scaphoid dislocation combined with a dorsal perilunate dislocation, which was treated with open reduction, fixed with two Kirschner wires and ligament repair, with a good result.
metadata.dc:title: Luxación palmar del escafoides carpiano asociado a una luxación perilunar dorsal. A propósito de un caso y revisión de la bibliografía.
[Palmar scaphoid dislocation associated with dorsal perilunate dislocation. A case report and review of the literature].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de cirugia ortopedica y traumatologia
